contextName.description: The name for the context. Used as a parameter name in the method to fetch the realm property from C#

required.description: If true, a context is required when fetching this realm property.

description.description: A description for the context, to be shown in code docs when using the property

shortContexts.description: An object where the key is the context name, the value is the entity type as a string. Use the array form for more detailed context definitions

description: A set of contexts for this property. Each context requires an entity type to pass into the property when fetching it. The entities can be filtered with a scope in the ruleset definitions.
